about_the_game:
Isekai Idel ~ Become a lord and show your true ability~


Reincarnated as an otherworldly lord, you face the threat of various demons and even dragons around you, and the construction of internal towns is a difficult task.
However! You are a powerful reincarnator from the other world, with a heavenly skill panel, so you decided to make a strong effort to upgrade your skill level and recruit capable people to fight against demons and build a home together with you.

Game Features

In the game, you only need to gently point, you will be able to continuously exercise your skills, no need for unnecessary operations, just wait patiently, you can get the results of the exercise, they will be your combat to upgrade to the highest level to become a master of combat, or one of your passive skills to upgrade to the highest level to become a master, but also to obtain the legendary drops, and then make it into the legendary god-level Props.
And all of this, just need you to click on a certain skill page, and then one click, supplemented by enough time, all of it will become your harvest.

  • Huge Skill Tree
  • Different levels and types of battle zones and enemy types
  • Offline hangout earnings
  • Recruitable characters are constantly being updated, so recruit more characters to help you fight and build your town.
  • By practicing your skills, you can give more bonuses to your town and characters.
  • A variety of combat styles are continuously improved through constant battles.
  • The game system is rich in content and easy to learn, offering more than ten (continuously updated) non-combat skills that can be trained, each of which has its own mechanism and interacts with each other.
  • Continuously updated game content
  • First launch languages include Chinese, Japanese, Korean, English, and French. More languages are currently being developed and will be updated gradually in the future
